Sentencas: This study investigates the dip coating fabrication process in detail.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: First the slurry formulation development is presented.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: This includes optimizing the concentration of slurry components.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: Controlling the coating thickness is then addressed.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: It is shown that a broad range of uniform thicknesses from a few microns up to a few hundreds of microns is achievable by adjusting the solid loading and/or the dip coating rate.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs

Sentencas: This study reports that dip coating is a commercially reliable technique to fabricate micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells not only because it is low cost but, more importantly, because it is fairly reproducible and highly controllable.
Titulo: Dip coating fabrication process for micro-tubular SOFCs
